column1: comment_text
I hate you so much, you are disgusting.
I want to kill you.
You are completely useless, stop talking.
I really enjoyed your presentation today!
People like you are the reason everything is falling apart.
Thank you for your help, it meant a lot to me.
Get lost, nobody wants you around.
Your work was excellent, keep it up!
I hope something bad happens to you.
You always bring positivity wherever you go.
You’re such a disappointment to everyone here.
This is a great idea, I fully support it.
You don't belong here, go away.
I love how thoughtful you are with your answers.
Your presence ruins everything.
I’m proud of how far you’ve come.
Why don't you just disappear already?
It’s inspiring to see your dedication.
You make everyone uncomfortable just by being here.
I appreciate your honesty and kindness.
Everything about you is pathetic.
Thanks for always being supportive and respectful.
